description_for_model: Multi-domain tool suite for Czech public data using CzechFabric MCP. Supports Czech and English queries. Domains: (1) TRANSPORT - public transit departures, routing, stops, geocoding; (2) AIR QUALITY - real-time pollution monitoring, AQI, health recommendations for Prague. All parameters must be in English.

x-czechfabric.llm_guidance: This plugin supports Czech ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¿ and English ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ natural language queries. All actual tool parameters must be passed in English. Use context clues to map user queries to tool functions correctly.

available_domains.description: Public transport departures, routing, stops, and geocoding

available_domains.name: Air Quality
available_domains.description: Real-time air quality monitoring and pollution data
